name: avatar-group
title: Avatar Group
oneLiner: Display a group of user avatars with overflow handling

apiDoc.name: AvatarGroup
apiDoc.description: Displays a stacked group of user avatars with customizable layout, spacing, and overflow handling. Supports horizontal/vertical orientation, configurable maximum display count, and optional click handlers for avatars and overflow indicator. Can skip current user and provides custom overflow snippet support.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance for user data fetching

props.name: pubkeys
props.description: Array of pubkeys to display as avatars

props.name: skipCurrentUser
props.description: Skip displaying the current user's avatar

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum number of avatars to display

props.name: overflowSnippet
props.description: Custom Svelte 5 snippet for overflow display
